mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_IDK, USER_ID, REDEM_CODE, PAY_STATUS, DELIVERY_STATUS, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, DELIVERY_PHONE, DELIVERY_CONTENT, TOTAL_PRICE, COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, ACTUAL_PRICE, ORDER_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ORDER_IDK, USER_ID, REDEM_CODE, PAY_STATUS, DELIVERY_STATUS, DELIVERY_NAME, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, DELIVERY_PHONE, DELIVERY_CONTENT, TOTAL_PRICE, COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, ACTUAL_PRICE, ORDER_DATE FROM(SELECT ORDER_IDK, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(REDEM_CODE, '') AS REDEM_CODE, NVL(PAY_STATUS, '') AS PAY_STATUS, NVL(DELIVERY_STATUS, '') AS DELIVERY_STATUS, NVL(DELIVERY_NAME, '') AS DELIVERY_NAME, NVL(DELIVERY_ADDRESS, '') AS DELIVERY_ADDRESS, NVL(DELIVERY_PHONE, '') AS DELIVERY_PHONE, NVL(DELIVERY_CONTENT, '') AS DELIVERY_CONTENT, NVL(TOTAL_PRICE, 0) AS TOTAL_PRICE, NVL(COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, 0) AS COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, NVL(ACTUAL_PRICE, 0) AS ACTUAL_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') AS ORDER_DATE FROM ORDERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY ORDER_IDK DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT ORDER_IDK, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(REDEM_CODE, '') AS REDEM_CODE, NVL(PAY_STATUS, '') AS PAY_STATUS, NVL(DELIVERY_STATUS, '') AS DELIVERY_STATUS, NVL(DELIVERY_NAME, '') AS DELIVERY_NAME, NVL(DELIVERY_ADDRESS, '') AS DELIVERY_ADDRESS, NVL(DELIVERY_PHONE, '') AS DELIVERY_PHONE, NVL(DELIVERY_CONTENT, '') AS DELIVERY_CONTENT, NVL(TOTAL_PRICE, 0) AS TOTAL_PRICE, NVL(COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, 0) AS COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, NVL(ACTUAL_PRICE, 0) AS ACTUAL_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') AS ORDER_DATE FROM ORDERS WHERE USER_ID = #{value} ORDER BY ORDER_IDK DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(O.ORDER_IDK), 0) AS CNT FROM ORDERS O, USERS U WHERE O.USER_ID = #{userId} AND O.USER_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT ORDER_IDK, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(REDEM_CODE, '') AS REDEM_CODE, NVL(PAY_STATUS, '') AS PAY_STATUS, NVL(DELIVERY_STATUS, '') AS DELIVERY_STATUS, NVL(DELIVERY_NAME, '') AS DELIVERY_NAME, NVL(DELIVERY_ADDRESS, '') AS DELIVERY_ADDRESS, NVL(DELIVERY_PHONE, '') AS DELIVERY_PHONE, NVL(DELIVERY_CONTENT, '') AS DELIVERY_CONTENT, NVL(TOTAL_PRICE, 0) AS TOTAL_PRICE, NVL(COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, 0) AS COUPON_DISCOUNT_PRICE, NVL(ACTUAL_PRICE, 0) AS ACTUAL_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') AS ORDER_DATE FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_IDK = #{value}

SELECT D.ORDER_IDK, D.ORDER_DETAIL_IDK, D.PRODUCT_IDK, NVL(D.QUANTITY, 0) AS QUANTITY, NVL(D.PRODUCT_PRICE, 0) AS PRODUCT_PRICE, NVL(D.REVIEW_STATUS, 'N') AS REVIEW_STATUS, NVL(P.PRODUCT_NAME, '') AS PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(P.PRODUCT_CODE, '') AS PRODUCT_CODE, NVL(P.PRODUCT_FILE_EXT, '') AS PRODUCT_FILE_EXT FROM ORDER_DETAIL D, PRODUCT P WHERE D.ORDER_IDK = #{value} AND D.PRODUCT_IDK = P.PRODUCT_IDK

SELECT D.ORDER_IDK, D.ORDER_DETAIL_IDK, D.PRODUCT_IDK, NVL(D.QUANTITY, 0) AS QUANTITY, NVL(D.PRODUCT_PRICE, 0) AS PRODUCT_PRICE, NVL(D.REVIEW_STATUS, 'N') AS REVIEW_STATUS, NVL(P.PRODUCT_NAME, '') AS PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(P.PRODUCT_CODE, '') AS PRODUCT_CODE, NVL(P.PRODUCT_FILE_EXT, '') AS PRODUCT_FILE_EXT FROM ORDER_DETAIL D, PRODUCT P WHERE D.ORDER_IDK = #{orderIdk} AND D.ORDER_DETAIL_IDK = #{orderDetailIdk} AND D.PRODUCT_IDK = P.PRODUCT_IDK
